CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Bimolecular recombination was also investigated by measuring the dependence of J sc against light intensity , in which the exponential factor α in the power law of J sc ∝ P light α is used Article to indicate bimolecular recombination in the BHJ film.

Let's think step by step.

1. Bimolecular recombination
2. J sc (Junction Scans)
3. P light (Light Intensity)
4. α (Exponential factor)

The first entity identified is "Bimolecular recombination," which is the main topic of the paragraph. The other entities are "Junction Scans" (J sc), "Light Intensity" (P light), and "Exponential factor" (α). These entities are mentioned in the context of investigating bimolecular recombination in a BHJ (Bulk Heterojunction) film.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. BHJ film (Bulk Heterojunction film)

The only entity in the paragraph that clearly refers to a material is "BHJ film" (Bulk Heterojunction film), as it is the specific type of film where the investigation of bimolecular recombination is being conducted.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| BHJ film (Bulk Heterojunction film) |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Bimolecular recombination was also investigated by measuring the dependence of J sc against light intensity , in which the exponential factor α in the power law of J sc ∝ P light α is used Article to indicate bimolecular recombination in the BHJ film.

Let's think step by step.

1. J sc: The current density of the photovoltaic cell under the light-illuminated condition. It is a property value related to the electrical conductivity of the material under light exposure.
2. P light: The intensity of the light. It is a property value related to the amount of energy being applied to the system.
3. α: The exponential factor in the power law equation, which indicates the degree of bimolecular recombination in the BHJ (Blend of Hole Transporting and Electron Transporting materials in a Junction film) film. It is a property value related to the rate of recombination of charge carriers in the material.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. J sc: The current density of the photovoltaic cell under light illumination. It is a property value related to the electrical conductivity of the material under light exposure.
2. α: The exponential factor in the power law equation, which indicates the degree of bimolecular recombination in the BHJ film. It is a property value related to the rate of recombination of charge carriers in the material.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| J sc: the current density of the photovoltaic cell under light illumination |
| α: the exponential factor in the power law equation, indicating the degree of bimolecular recombination in the BHJ film |
